name: NegaRunner
description:
Short visual novel made in GameMaker 1.4 during Warsaw Film School Jam 4 with the theme being "negative". 

Press "F" after menu to enter fullscreen.
Use arrows and "Z" to play.

Credits:
programming and script: @dekigokoro_
graphics and script: @zoz_bmp
music: @ku ku
script and animation: @xj
additional programming: @ShyMoon
